request.description:
Username Must be in the format of "firstName.lastName" with minimum number of 6 characters

Password is optional .. if not provided, the default password will be taken from username like the following example: 

username : John.Smith 

password: js.1234

role is optional - default value = user

permissions is not required - default value = []

Update all user data 
username
email
password
isActive
role

if password changed user will be logged out
if isActive is set to false user will be logged out and disabled

Username Must be in the format of "firstName.lastName" with minimum number of 6 characters

Password is optional .. if not provided, the default password will be taken from username like the following example:
username : John.Smith
password: js.1234



User is disabled by default after registration

exec: //print the decodedData to console to see the structure

request.description:
Login with (Email or Username) and Password

Permissions will be set after each login request
